_xResult.title: My Autumn Black and White Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made winter maxi with turtle neck
_xResult.longdesc:
A winter wind ruffling the sea. A fall breeze that brushes the leaf’s on trees. A sand dune graced by the touch of sea turtles. Let this custom made winter dress transport you to the quiet places, full of beauty, that are barely grazed during the winter. You’ll be warm to enjoy in the handcrafted maxi made out of soft brushed cotton. The extra-long-sleeves and cozy turtle neck will keep you intoxicatingly comfortable.

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
